item.title: 部长表示，瑞银的资本要求应适度
item.description: 瑞士财政部长卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）表示，由于瑞士试图在金融业竞争力和保护纳税人之间取得平衡，新的银行业法规对瑞银的资本要求应该 "适度"。【原文：Capital requirements set for UBS under new banking regulations should be "proportionate", as Switzerland attempts to strike a balance between financial sector competitiveness and protecting taxpayers, Finance Minister Karin Keller-Sutter said.】

item.title: 大众汽车工人在德国各地举行警告性罢工
item.description: 德国 IG Metall 工会表示，大众汽车工人将于周一在所有工厂举行警告性罢工，这是大众汽车国内业务自 2018 年以来的首次大规模罢工。【原文：Volkswagen workers will go on warning strikes on Monday at all plants, Germany's IG Metall union said, marking the first large-scale walkouts at Volkswagen's domestic operations since 2018.】

item.title: 美国需求疲软，韩国出口增长放缓至 14 个月低点
item.description: 周日的贸易数据显示，由于关税不确定性导致对美国和中国的出货量下降，韩国 11 月份的出口增长连续第四个月放缓，创下 14 个月以来的最弱水平。【原文：South Korea's export growth slowed for a fourth-straight month in November, to the weakest level in 14 months, as shipments to the United States and China fell amid tariff uncertainty, trade data showed on Sunday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚总理阿尔巴内斯称马斯克在社交媒体禁令批评中推动了 X 的议程
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内塞周日表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对澳大利亚禁止 16 岁以下儿童使用社交媒体的批评是 X 的所有者在推动社交平台的议程，同时表示他愿意与这位亿万富翁就本周立法的禁令进行讨论。【原文：Australia Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Sunday that criticism by Elon Musk of Australia's social media ban on children under 16 was the X owner pushing an agenda for the social platform, while indicating he was open to talk to the billionaire about the ban, legislated this week.】

item.title: 高塔姆-阿达尼打破对美国贿赂起诉的沉默
item.description: 这位亿万富翁说，公司致力于 "世界级的合规性"，但没有提供更多细节。【原文：The billionaire said the company is committed to "world-class regulatory compliance," without giving further details.】

item.title: 黑色星期五数据显示美国购物者网上消费达 108 亿美元
item.description: Adobe Analytics 的数据显示，这一数字比一年前增长了 10%。【原文：It was a 10% rise from a year ago, according to Adobe Analytics.】

item.title: 瑞士央行主席称瑞士工业感受到德国的疲软
item.description: 瑞士国家银行主席马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）周六表示，德国工业目前的疲软正在削弱瑞士制造业的需求。【原文：The current weakness in German industry is sapping demand in Switzerland's manufacturing sector, Swiss National Bank Chairman Martin Schlegel said on Saturday.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，汇丰银行开始物色下任董事长
item.description: 据天空新闻周六报道，总部位于英国的汇丰控股董事会已指定猎头公司开始招聘下一任主席，接替马克-塔克（Mark Tucker）。【原文：UK-headquartered HSBC Holdings' board has appointed headhunters to start the recruitment of its next chairman to succeed Mark Tucker, Sky News reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，日产汽车首席财务官斯蒂芬-马即将卸任
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周六援引知情人士的话报道，日产汽车首席财务官马世民（Stephen Ma）即将卸任。【原文：Nissan Motor's CFO Stephen Ma is set to step down, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百度 Apollo 自动驾驶汽车获准在香港测试
item.description: 中国百度获得了在香港测试自动驾驶汽车的许可证，其阿波罗机器人出租车服务将在中国大陆以外的地区开展。【原文：China's Baidu has received the licence to test autonomous vehicles with its Apollo robotaxi service in Hong Kong as it expands its footprint outside Chinese mainland.】

item.title: 摩根大通同意撤销对特斯拉股票权证的诉讼
item.description: 美国贷款机构摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）周五同意撤销对电动汽车制造商特斯拉（Tesla）提起的与股票权证交易有关的诉讼。【原文：U.S. lender JPMorgan Chase agreed on Friday to drop its lawsuit filed against electric vehicle maker Tesla linked to stock warrant transactions.】

item.title: 中国 11 月工厂活动连续第二个月扩张
item.description: 周六，一项官方调查显示，11 月份中国工厂活动连续第二个月温和增长。 周六的一项官方调查显示，11 月份中国工厂活动连续第二个月小幅增长，最近的一系列数据表明，刺激经济的大潮终于在这个世界第二大经济体中蔓延开来。【原文：China's factory activity expanded modestly for a second straight month in November, an official survey showed on Saturday, adding to a string of recent data suggesting a blitz of stimulus is finally trickling through the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 消息人士称道明银行聘用汇丰加拿大前首席合规官
item.description: 三位消息人士告诉路透社，道明银行已聘请加拿大皇家银行的乔治亚-斯塔夫里迪斯（Georgia Stavridis）担任金融犯罪风险管理副总裁，这是一个新设立的职位。【原文：TD Bank has hired Georgia Stavridis from Royal Bank of Canada to become a vice president in financial crimes risk management, a newly created role, three sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 巴西卢拉提名 Bradesco 首席交易员担任央行货币政策主管
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周五表示，巴西央行提名 Bradesco 银行首席交易员尼尔顿-大卫（Nilton David）从 1 月份开始担任央行下一任货币政策主管。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva nominated Nilton David, head trader at Bradesco bank, to serve as the next monetary policy director at the central bank starting in January, the institution said on Friday.】

item.title: 加拿大称北美自由贸易伙伴应在中国问题上完全一致
item.description: 加拿大财政部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）周五表示，加拿大认为美墨加贸易协定成员国有机会制定出完全一致的对华政策。【原文：Canada thinks the members of the U.S.-Mexico-Canada trade pact have a chance to produce a fully aligned policy on China, Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，智利国家铜业公司（Codelco）提高铜产量，为实现 2024 年目标做最后冲刺
item.description: 两位消息人士和一份内部文件显示，智利国营企业 Codelco 正在加紧提高铜产量，力争实现 2024 年的目标，这有可能扭转今年上半年的疲软局面。【原文：Chilean state-run Codelco is making a late dash to rev up its copper production in a bid to hit 2024 targets, two sources and an internal document show, potentially turning things around after a weak first half of the year.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，意大利正设法应对意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）对 BPM 的收购要约
item.description: 金融时报》周五援引两位知情人士的话报道称，意大利政府正在寻求各种方案，以应对意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）对规模较小的竞争对手 Banco BPM 的收购要约，其中包括一项紧急法令。【原文：The Italian government is vying options to counter UniCredit's takeover bid for smaller rival Banco BPM , including an emergency decree, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing two people with knowledge of the plans.】

item.title: 法院否决后，欧盟监管机构废除了针对杀手级收购的兼并权
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周五放弃了一项旨在扼杀并购的并购工具，而在此之前两个月，欧洲最高法院否决了这一扩大的并购权力，该权力曾被企业广泛批评为监管过度。【原文：EU antitrust regulators on Friday ditched a merger tool aimed at killer acquisitions two months after Europe's top court vetoed this expanded merger power which had been widely criticised by companies as regulatory over-reach.】

item.title: 消息称梅赛德斯将在 4 款车型中使用 Momenta 软件，加速重返中国市场
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，梅赛德斯-奔驰正将赌注押在中国的 Momenta 身上，以帮助其在全球最大的汽车市场赢回市场份额，并计划进行新的投资，未来至少有四款车型将使用这家自动驾驶初创公司的软件。【原文：Mercedes-Benz is betting on China's Momenta to help it win back market share in the world's biggest auto market, with plans for fresh investment and at least four future models to use the autonomous driving startup's software, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚截至 11 月的 12 个月通胀率为 5.13
item.description: 据路透社周五公布的一项民意调查显示，哥伦比亚11月份的通货膨胀率预计为0.20%，与去年同期相比有所下降，主要原因是食品价格的变化。【原文：Colombian inflation in November is forecast to have hit 0.20% versus the same month a year ago, mostly due to changing food prices, according to a Reuters poll published on Friday, which also saw year-end expectations decline.】

item.title: 加拿大经济仅增长 1%，大幅降息的可能性骤增
item.description: 加拿大第三季度的年化经济增长率仅为 1%，低于加拿大央行的预测，这促使货币市场加大了对下个月大幅降息的押注。【原文：Canada's economy grew at an annualized rate of just 1% in the third quarter, less than what the Bank of Canada had predicted, prompting currency markets to boost bets for a jumbo rate cut next month.】

item.title: 大众汽车对工会提出的成本节约建议敷衍了事
item.description: 在高成本和中国竞争的压力下，大众汽车公司周五拒绝了工会提出的节约成本的建议，就在为避免史无前例的工厂关闭而计划举行罢工的前几天。【原文：Volkswagen , under pressure by high costs and Chinese competition, brushed off union proposals for cost savings on Friday, just days ahead of planned walkouts meant to avoid unprecedented plant closures.】

item.title: 在德国不受欢迎，联合信贷银行首席执行官将目光投向意大利
item.description: 就在意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）首席执行官安德里亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）将目光投向意大利收购目标的前几天，有更多证据表明，他对德国旗舰银行德国商业银行（Commerzbank）的兴趣遭到了激烈抵制。【原文：Just days before UniCredit CEO Andrea Orcel set his sight on a takeover target in Italy, more evidence emerged of fierce resistance to his interest in German flagship lender Commerzbank.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 就业数据将为利率路径和股市铺平道路
item.description: 下周将公布一份备受关注的就业报告，这将使投资者对美国经济的健康状况有一个全新的认识，该报告可能有助于决定未来几个月的利率走势。【原文：The coming week will give investors a fresh view into the health of the U.S. economy with the release of a closely watched employment report that could help determine the trajectory of interest rates in the months ahead.】

item.title: 据《西雅图时报》报道，阿拉斯加航空公司空乘人员恢复合同谈判
item.description: 据《西雅图时报》周五报道，阿拉斯加航空公司的空乘人员上周恢复了与航空公司的合同谈判，谈判内容为一项修订提案【原文：Flight attendants at Alaska Airlines resumed contract negotiations with the carrier last week on a revised proposal, Seattle Times reported on Friday】

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）在塔吉特（Target）百货公司的独家促销活动吸引了众多顾客前来购物
item.description: Target 在 "黑色星期五 "独家在店内发布泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的新书《Eras Tour》，部分店外排起了长队，提前收到了成效。【原文：Target's exclusive, in-store launch of Taylor Swift's new Eras Tour book on Black Friday paid off early with lines outside some of the stores.】

item.title: VIEW 加拿大第三季度经济增长 1
item.description: 周五公布的数据显示，加拿大第三季度经济增长符合预期，年化增长率为 1%，这主要得益于家庭和政府支出的增长，但商业投资和出口的减少抵消了部分增长。【原文：Canada's economy grew as expected at an annualized rate of 1% in the third quarter, according to data released on Friday, helped by household and government spending and partly offset by lower business investments and exports.】

item.title: 中国凯撒集团将发行以美元计价的强制可转换债券和优先票据
item.description: 总部位于中国的房地产开发商凯撒集团周五表示，作为重组 122.7 亿美元未偿债务努力的一部分，该公司将向债权人发行美元优先票据和强制可转换债券。【原文：China-based property developer Kaisa Group said on Friday it would issue a combination of U.S. dollar-denominated senior notes and mandatory convertible bonds to creditors as part of its efforts to restructure $12.27 billion of outstanding debt.】

item.title: 加拿大第三季度经济按年率计算增长 1.0%，10 月份国内生产总值可能增长 0.1
item.description: 路透社渥太华11月29日电）加拿大统计局周五公布的数据显示，加拿大第三季度经济按年率计算增长了1.0%，符合分析师的预期，原因是家庭和政府支出的增长因非农业库存积累放缓而有所放缓。【原文：OTTAWA, Nov 29 (Reuters) - Canada's economy was up 1.0% on an annualized basis in the third quarter, in line with analysts' expectations, as higher household and government spending were moderated by slower non-farm inventory accumulation, Statistics Canada data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 巴西咖啡产量令人担忧，咖啡价格创 47 年新高
item.description: 由于头号种植国巴西明年的作物难以从今年的干旱中完全恢复，咖啡供应趋紧，咖啡价格周五上涨至近半个世纪以来的最高点。【原文：Coffee prices rose on Friday to their highest in nearly half a century, buoyed by tightening supplies as next year's crop in top grower Brazil struggles to recover fully from this year's drought.】
